title: Nikki Toscano
description:
In this episode Ellen sits down with writer, executive producer, and showrunner Nikki Toscano. They discuss Nikki's career as a writer and showrunner, what it takes to get a TV show made, and take a behind the scenes look at The Offer.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
